body:
Apple (AAPL) : In a disclosure report filed on Jan 24, 2017, The Asset Management company Private Bank Trust Co said it has purchased 955 additional shares in Apple (AAPL) during the most recent quarter end. The investment management firm now holds a total of 43,981 shares of Apple which is valued at $5,281,238.Apple makes up approximately 0.76% of Private Bank Trust Co’s portfolio.

Other Asset Management firms and mutual funds Sell and Buy Stocks to adjust their portfolio based on the Investoment strategies.Asset Management firm, Town Country Bank Trust Co Dba First Bankers Trust Co reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 285 shares or 1.3% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 21,576 shares of AAPL which is valued at $2,590,846. Apple makes up approx 1.43% of Town Country Bank Trust Co Dba First Bankers Trust Co’s portfolio.Asset Management firm, Vector Wealth Management reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 1,361 shares or 3.41% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 38,511 shares of AAPL which is valued at $4,620,935. Apple makes up approx 3.13% of Vector Wealth Management’s portfolio.Asset Management firm, Daniel Devine Co reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 8,900 shares or 12.9% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 60,083 shares of AAPL which is valued at $7,209,359. Apple makes up approx 5.05% of Daniel Devine Co’s portfolio.Asset Management firm, Longer Investments reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 7,258 shares or 24.67% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 22,164 shares of AAPL which is valued at $2,659,680. Apple makes up approx 2.40% of Longer Investments’s portfolio.Bank Of Stockton boosted its stake in AAPL in the latest quarter, The investment management firm added 67 additional shares and now holds a total of 20,174 shares of Apple which is valued at $2,420,880. Apple makes up approx 1.14% of Bank Of Stockton’s portfolio.Asset Management firm, Coastline Trust Co reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 485 shares or 1.14% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 42,169 shares of AAPL which is valued at $5,019,798. Apple makes up approx 0.97% of Coastline Trust Co’s portfolio.Asset Management firm, Peachtree Investment Advisors reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 2,825 shares or 7.42% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 35,247 shares of AAPL which is valued at $4,203,205. Apple makes up approx 4.08% of Peachtree Investment Advisors’s portfolio.Franklin Street Advisors Inc Nc boosted its stake in AAPL in the latest quarter, The investment management firm added 10,282 additional shares and now holds a total of 221,141 shares of Apple which is valued at $26,313,568. Apple makes up approx 4.57% of Franklin Street Advisors Inc Nc’s portfolio.

Several firms have issued research on Apple. Shares were Downgraded by Barclays on Jan 24, 2017 to ” Equal Weight” and Lowered the Price Target to $ 117 from a previous price target of $119 .Company shares were Reiterated by Macquarie on Jan 20, 2017 to “Outperform”, Firm has raised the Price Target to $ 148 from a previous price target of $133 .Company shares were Reiterated by BofA/Merrill on Jan 19, 2017 to “Buy”, Firm has raised the Price Target to $ 140 from a previous price target of $125 .Guggenheim Initiated Apple on Jan 4, 2017 to “Buy”, Price Target of the shares are set at $140.Piper Jaffray Resumed Apple on Dec 16, 2016 to “Overweight”, Price Target of the shares are set at $155.

On the company’s financial health, Apple reported $1.67 EPS for the quarter, beating the analyst consensus estimate by $ 0.01 according to the earnings call on Oct 25, 2016. Analyst had a consensus of $1.66. The company had revenue of $46852.00 million for the quarter, compared to analysts expectations of $46977.40 million. The company’s revenue was down -9.0 % compared to the same quarter last year.During the same quarter in the previous year, the company posted $1.96 EPS.

In a separate transaction, on Jan 19, 2017, Timothy D Cook (Chief Executive Officer) sold 30,000 shares at 120.00 per share price.On Jan 19, 2017, Daniel J. Riccio (Senior Vice President) sold 10,942 shares at 119.99 per share price.On Jan 10, 2017, Luca Maestri (Senior Vice President, CFO) sold 4,010 shares at 117.88 per share price.

Apple opened for trading at $120 and hit $120.81 on the upside on Monday, eventually ending the session at $120.08, with a gain of 0.07% or 0.08 points. The heightened volatility saw the trading volume jump to 22,050,218 shares. Company has a market cap of $631,359 M.
title: Private Bank Trust Co Boosts Position by $5,281,238 in Apple (AAPL) – Hignland Mirror
